reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Visits to Finland by journalists from the developing countries

description.narrative: The aim of the project is to build networks between Finnish anddeveloping country journalists and to show what openness and freedom of the press means in practice. Main objective of these media visits is to support sustainable politicaleconomic and social development of developing countries accordingto the development policy and development cooperation objectives ofFinland.The total value of the project is 60 000? and it consists of the following parts:1. Media visit on HealthTech 04/20192. Participation of journalists working in Ethiopia to UNESCO's International Press Freedom Day 2.-3.5.3. Media Visit on Circular Economy 06/20194. Visit on education and participation to Dare to Learn-event 17.-19.9. 5. Visit of the representative of AWJU (Afghan Woman Jou rnalist Union ) to Finland 10/20196. Smart Cities -media visit in Spanish 11/20197. Journalist visit on press freedom and media issues 11/20198. New visit proposals from the embassies or cooperation partners

The aim of the project is to build networks between Finnish anddeveloping country journalists and to show what openness and freedom of the press means in practice. Main objective of these media visits is to support sustainable politicaleconomic and social development of developing countries accordingto the development policy and development cooperation objectives ofFinland.The total value of the project is 60 000? and it consists of the following parts:1. Media visit on HealthTech 04/20192. Participation of journalists working in Ethiopia to UNESCO's International Press Freedom Day 2.-3.5.3. Media Visit on Circular Economy 06/20194. Visit on education and participation to Dare to Learn-event 17.-19.9. 5. Visit of the representative of AWJU (Afghan Woman Jou rnalist Union ) to Finland 10/20196. Smart Cities -media visit in Spanish 11/20197. Journalist visit on press freedom and media issues 11/20198. New visit proposals from the embassies or cooperation partners

tag.narrative: Generating jobs, livelihood opportunities and well-being in a developing country is a secondary priority area in this activity
Improving democracy in societies is the main priority area in this activity
